org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections

Class TrimmerPluginArgumentCollection

  • java.lang.Object

    public abstract class TrimmerPluginArgumentCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    Argument collection to use with TrimmerPluginDescriptor.

    • Field Detail

      • disable5pTrim

        @Argument(fullName="disable5pTrim",
          shortName="D5PT",
          doc="Disable 5\'-trimming. Cannot be true when argument disable3pTrim (D3PT) is true.",
          optional=true)
public boolean disable5pTrim
        Disable 5'-trimming. May be useful for downstream mark of duplicate reads, usually identified by the 5' mapping position. Cannot be true when disable3pTrim (D3P) is true.

      • disable3pTrim

        @Argument(fullName="disable3pTrim",
          shortName="D3PT",
          doc="Disable 3\'-trimming. Cannot be true when argument disable5pTrim (D5PT) is true.",
          optional=true)
public boolean disable3pTrim

    • Method Detail

      • getUserEnabledTrimmerNames

        public abstract java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserEnabledTrimmerNames()
        Gets the trimmers enabled by the user in the command line.

        Note: should preserve the order.

        Returns:
        non null list of trimmers to use.

      • getUserDisabledTrimmerNames

        public abstract java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getUserDisabledTrimmerNames()
        Gets the trimmers disabled by the user in the command line.
        Returns:
        non null list of trimmers to be disabled. It might be empty if disabling trimmers is unsupported.

      • getDisableToolDefaultTrimmers

        public abstract boolean getDisableToolDefaultTrimmers()
        Checks how default trimmers should be handled.
        Returns:
        true if default trimmers should be disabled; false otherwise.
